name: Mighty Switch Force! 2
description:
Combat the Planetary Inferno in the shape-shifting, dimension melding
world of Mighty Switch Force 2!

It’s a Code Red from the Galactic Fire Brigade! Planet Land is
combusting and everything is ablaze! Return to HQ immediately and pick
up your Infinity Dousing Apparatus; your Siren Helmet is still
authorized and up to code! The mission: to fight the inferno and
extricate the reformed Hooligan sisters! Now, suit up and start soaking
some scenery!

The sequel to the universally acclaimed Mighty Switch Force, and the
newest game in the Mighty series!

Grab your new weapon, a super-powered fire hose, and embark on a
treacherous search-and-rescue mission!

Familiar friends and foes return, along with exciting new ones!

Puzzles and brain-bending action return!
